SEARCH
Package org.presentation.generators

Class BaseGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.presentation.generators.BaseGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
DisciplinesGenerator, FreeRoomsGenerator, HomeGenerator, RoomsGenerator, StudentsGenerator, TeachersGenerator, TimetablesGenerator
public abstract class BaseGenerator extends Object
The abstract BaseGenerator class provides a foundation for specific generators used to generate the HTML pages of the timetable.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final @NotBlank(message="Generation string must not be blank") String
    generationDateString
    The generation date string to be displayed on the page.
    protected final @NotEmpty(message="Separator must not be empty.") String
    separator
    The separator string used to separate the timetable tables.
    protected final @NotNull(message="Days data map must not be null") Map<String,Map<Timeslot.Day,StringBuilder>>
    timetablesDays
    The map containing the timetable data organized by table names and days.
    protected final @NotNull(message="Template utils must not be null") TemplateUtils
    utils
    The TemplateUtils object used to read the HTML template files.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseGenerator

      public BaseGenerator(@NotBlank(message="Generation string must not be blank") @NotBlank(message="Generation string must not be blank") String generationDateString, @NotNull(message="Days data map must not be null") @NotNull(message="Days data map must not be null") Map<String,Map<Timeslot.Day,StringBuilder>> timetablesDays)
      Constructs a BaseGenerator object with the specified generation date string and timetables days data.
      Parameters:
      generationDateString - The generation date string to be displayed on the page. Must not be blank.
      timetablesDays - The map containing the timetable data organized by table names and days. Must not be null.

  • Method Details

    • addToDaysMap

      protected void addToDaysMap(@NotBlank(message="Table name must not be blank") @NotBlank(message="Table name must not be blank") String tableName)
      Adds a table name to the timetablesDays map, with empty data for all days of the week. This method initializes a new HashMap with empty data for all days of the week, for the specified table name in the timetablesDays map.
      Parameters:
      tableName - The name of the table. Must not be blank.

    • generate

      public abstract void generate()
      Generates specific data or performs tasks for the generator. This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses. It is responsible for generating specific data or performing tasks related to the generator's functionality. Each subclass of BaseGenerator provides its own implementation of this method.
